mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_usehand_student ( use_number, qb_number, tb_number, use_date, user_email ) VALUES ( use_num.NEXTVAL, #{qb_number}, #{tb_number}, CURRENT_DATE, #{user_email} )
INSERT INTO tbl_handback_student ( hb_number, qb_number, tb_number, hback_date, user_email ) VALUES ( hb_num.NEXTVAL, #{qb_number}, #{tb_number}, CURRENT_DATE, #{user_email} )
